short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser's new tab page into a mesmerizing seascape

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oceanic Serenity transforms your browser's new tab page into a mesmerizing seascape, featuring the power and beauty of ocean waves crashing against rugged rocks. With this extension, every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted by the tranquil yet powerful atmosphere of the ocean, providing a moment of calm and inspiration throughout your day.
